resources.string: By continuing, I confirm that I have read, understood and agree to Terms and Conditions and MOPAPO"'"s Privacy Policy

This app requires location and Bluetooth permission to perform any Bluetooth communication, such as requesting a connection, accepting a connection, and transferring data. Because discoverable devices might reveal information about the user location, the device discovery process requires location access. Your device location will be in use in the background (when the app is closed) to ensure continuous connection with the closest printer
Set Up 4 digit PIN to login quicker next time
